issue.title: [CF 1388] Possible to track Spells being cast on specific units?
issue.body:
I am trying to make an icon that will tell me if if a harmful spell is being cast and i am the target. So far i tested the Combat Event icon type but it does not seem to distinguish who the spell is being cast on even though i specified the destination to be player. Am i missing something?

 

Thanks.


> Posted by CurseForge user meltra | Imported from CurseForge issue #1388 | Raw

comments.body:
Blizzard doesn't allow addons to filter spell cast combat events based on the target when the target is a friendly player and the source is an enemy.

Edited Mar 21, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
